channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-16483] HoS should populate split related configurations to HiveConf
item.description:
There are several split related configurations, such as MAPREDMINSPLITSIZE, MAPREDMINSPLITSIZEPERNODE, MAPREDMINSPLITSIZEPERRACK, etc., that should be populated to HiveConf. Currently we only do this for MAPREDMINSPLITSIZE.
All the others, if not set, will be using the default value, which is 1.

Without these, Spark sometimes will not merge small files for file formats such as text.
item.summary: HoS should populate split related configurations to HiveConf

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
